scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:backend: cd backend && python -m pip install --break-system-packages -r requirements.txt
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && python3 -c "import uvicorn; uvicorn.run('main:app', host='0.0.0.0', port=8000, reload=True)"
scripts.dev: sudo docker compose up -d db && sleep 5 && concurrently -n "backend,frontend" -c "auto,blue" "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.start:prod: ENV=production concurrently -n "backend,frontend" -c "auto,blue" "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.start:dev: ENV=development concurrently -n "backend,frontend" -c "auto,blue" "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.db:reset: sudo docker compose down -v && sudo docker compose up -d db
